title: My account has been hacked
body: My account has been hacked and the hacker is pretending to be me. They have changed the email of my account multiple times. They have also made fake ticket requests on the support page. Ive sent my own ticket requests but not have been replied to, instead the support only replies to the fake requests that the hacker has sent. Ive also tried sending tweets to the Riot support twitter but not have received any replies there either.

replies.body: Is it the account you are posting from?  Let me know and I can lock it as a security precaution for you.  Don't worry, we can help with getting your account back!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will get right down to it.  In the meantime, I recommend going over our[ account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to lock down your info inside and out of game!
it is this account im posting from. i sent in a ticket last night but did not get a response.

I also tried the account recovery form, if i try to click the link to add more information to it, it sends me to a 404 page. I have also not received anything from sending that form as well. Your post was the only response I've gotten the past two days.
Also my account got suspended because of the hacking
can riot please reply to my post
